info.description: This is a REST API for managing Teachers, Students and Executives
info.title: REST API Documentation

delete.description: Delete all students from the system
Delete all teachers from the system

get.description:
Get a list of all executives
Create one or multiple new executives

post.description:
Get a list of all executives
Create one or multiple new executives
Send a password reset link to the executive's email

200.description: Password reset link sent to email

post.description: Authenticate an executive with username and password
Log out the currently authenticated executive
Reset an executive's password using a reset token

get.description: Get a specific executive by their ID

delete.description: Delete a specific executive by their ID

patch.description: Partially update a specific executive by ID

post.description: Update the password for a specific executive
Create one or multiple new students

get.description: Get a specific student by their ID

put.description: Update a specific student by their ID

delete.description: Delete a specific student by their ID

patch.description: Partially update a specific student by ID

get.description: Serves the Swagger specification in JSON format
Get a list of all teachers

post.description: Create one or multiple new teachers

delete.description: Delete multiple teachers by their IDs

patch.description:
Partially update multiple teachers
Partially update a specific teacher by ID

get.description: Get a specific teacher by their ID

put.description: Update a specific teacher by their ID

delete.description: Delete a specific teacher by their ID

patch.description:
Partially update multiple teachers
Partially update a specific teacher by ID

get.description: Get the number of students taught by a specific teacher
Get a list of all students taught by a specific teacher
